snippet: When LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers swept Boston in the first round of last year's playoffs, their championship hopes had already taken a major hit because of an injury to Kevin Love....
lead_paragraph: When LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers swept Boston in the first round of last year's playoffs, their championship hopes had already taken a major hit because of an injury to Kevin Love.

headline.main: Cavs Head Into Second Round Looking Sharp and Healthy
headline.print_headline: Cavs Head Into Second Round Looking Sharp and Healthy
